start.text: Hello, adventurer! Welcome to CoderQuest. Are you ready to begin your journey?

ready_path.text: Excellent! Your first quest awaits. Look for the glowing portal.

explain_coderquest.text: CoderQuest is a game where you learn coding concepts by completing quests. Each quest has lessons and quizzes to challenge you.

choices.text: I need more time to think.

goodbye_path.text: No worries. Come back when you are ready to learn and explore!
